name: Strava Club Heatmap and Segment Explorer
tagline: How can we help Strava Cycling users find clubs, explore new routes and meet new cycling partners?
body:
## Team Members

Collin Walker (cwalker2), Yitao Wang (yitaow), Si Xie (rickixie), Li Zeng (lizeng)

## Project

![Image of the project](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CSE512-16S/fp-rickixie-taoaoao-collnwalkr-lilizeng99/master/summary.png?token=AJb_RJVGsweM0HU9i0R7cPpMmstveC9jks5XX8BAwA%3D%3D)

## Abstract

Recent years have seen the increasing popularity of fitness tracking applications, among which Strava plays a leading role in facilitating online communities by individual connections and activity-based clubs. Given the limited visualizations Strava currently offers regarding club activities, we propose a visualization for Strava clubs, allowing cycling users to find prospective clubs, explore new routes and meet new partners. To better understand the problem space, we identified the design requirements by a literature review and interviews with end-users. Our implementation reduces the visual cluster and allows users to dynamically query with spatial and temporal dimensions, and it yields positive feedback in terms of systemâ€™s usability, visual appearance and the capability to facilitate interpersonal relationships.

## Software

Try out our visualization online [here](#).

## Running Instructions

Access our visualization at http://cse512-16s.github.io/fp-jheer-mcorrell-jhoffs/ or download this repository and run `python -m SimpleHTTPServer 9000` and access this from http://localhost:9000/.
